name: hi-con
description: ``` # sequence - student: put email to form - system: send QR to email - student: scan QR - student: accept verification - system: got hit /verify action - system: get NMID->ProxyContract_ADDR->NFT_ADDR - system: get NFT.isStudent state - system: generate onetime coupon by "bytes6(sha3(MNID + EventID))"  - system: OAuth to EventBrite - system: Save coupon to EventBrite - user: get coupon ```
